name: The Red Solstice
blurb: Squad based coop SF strategy/RPG and epic single player campaign, set on Mars colony during the huge storm

rewards.reward: INITIATE -\r\nBig thanks from Ironward and access to a digital wallpaper set.
SPECIAL RECRUIT - Full digital version of the game (Steam key), digital wallpaper set, Early Access in Beta
RECRUIT - Full digital version of the game (Steam key), digital wallpaper set, Early Access in Beta

SOLDIER \u2013  Full digital version of the game (Steam key), Early Access in Beta, as special thanks for being one of the soldiers, we will include your name in the OFFICIAL CREDITS section of the game, digital wallpaper set, digital soundtrack, short digital comic

VETERAN - Full digital version of the game (Steam key), additional game key, Early Access in Beta, as special thanks for being one of the soldiers, we will include your name in the OFFICIAL CREDITS section of the game, digital wallpaper set, digital soundtrack, short digital comic, your name/nick on a Veteran body PDA found around the map(part of objective players need to finish)

STRIKE SQUAD \u2013 SET of 4 full digital versions of the game (Steam keys), Early Access in Beta, as special thanks for being one of the soldiers, we will include your name in the OFFICIAL CREDITS section of the game, digital wallpaper set, digital soundtrack, short digital comic, your name/nick on a Veteran body PDA found around the map(part of objective players need to finish)

SQUAD LEADER -  LIMITED EDITION cover poster, art by Adam Burn (additional shipping cost of 10$). Your name/nick on a follower (friendly marine) found around the map,\r\nFull digital version of the game (Steam key), additional game key, Early Access in Beta, as special thanks for being one of the soldiers, we will include your name in the OFFICIAL CREDITS section of the game, digital wallpaper set, digital soundtrack, short digital comic, your name/nick on a Veteran body PDA found around the map(part of objective players need to finish)
COMMANDER - ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS +  Full Team set of game keys (8 Steam Keys for a full game), your name/nick will appear orange in lobby, name a street or building on the map
UNIT BLACK LIGHT - ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS + your name/nick will appear RED in game lobby so everyone can see, special and unique FLUFFY armor set

AETRIDEN - ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS + your name/nick will appear TEAL in game lobby so everyone can see, have a small ingame statute bulit on the game map and dedicated to you(with your name visible on it). Write your own memorandum up to 300 characters that will be displayed on the statue when it's examined.

M.E.R.C.S. - ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS + your name/nick will appear GREEN in game lobby so everyone can see, become one of the MAIN characters of the elite mercenary force who is doing an escort/cargo transport mission in the colony, with this tier you get to be included in the story.

THARSIS FOUNDER - ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS + your name/nick will appear GREY in game lobby so everyone can see, get a ingame statue as one of the three Tharsis founders, a big epic statue, with your own small story engraved upon it, work with devs to create the story related to Red Solstice.

EYLSIUM CORPORATION FOUNDER - ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS + come hang out with us for game launch party, play the game with the devs for few days (travel costs and accomodation are at your own expense), entire sector named after you, example "Central 'Drognan' sector", SPECIAL ONE OF LIMITED EDITION Elysium Corp. 3D prinited statue (of any marine class you choose). Instead of ingame Tharsis founder statue you will recieve a statue as one of Elysium Corp. Founders, as well as being credited in a primary multiplayer mission storyline.
